title: Bug splated twice on league.
body: Bug splated twice on league team remade game I didn't have enough time to load back in because of my slower internet and slower computer. Any way I can get these 5 bans removed? Not me or my computer's fault its a client issue. :/

replies.body: Leaverbuster queues result from multiple leaves and not just one game, so you may have a history of occurrences here.  The only way to remove it is by consistently playing without interruptions, and resolving whatever is causing these bugsplats.  I suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this, as you may have an issue with your drivers or game files.  Let me know if you have any questions.
